title: Hour 1: Mike'd Up
description:
In this episode, Harry Douglas, Ryan Clark, and Fred Taylor debate what Mike McCarthy needs to do in order to have some job security in Dallas and if he's the right guy for the job. After Kyler Murray's contract extension made headlines with a mandatory film study clause, the crew questions if he made the right decision to stay in Arizona. Another day, another anonymous defensive play caller shading a star NFL quarterback. Harry, Ryan, and Fred react to criticism of Patrick Mahomes being a tier 2 QB. Ole Miss Head Coach Lane Kiffin joins the show with his hot take on the impact of NIL deals on college sports and more reaction to his viral tiktok moment.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Can Mike McCarthy lead the Cowboys to a Super Bowl?
